law.text:
The secretary-treasurer, or any other officer or designee properly authorized by the board, shall:
Receive and account for all money collected under this chapter and pay it into the State Treasury; and (2)Provide in an electronic format on the board's Web site a roster showing the names and addresses of all professional engineers, professional land surveyors, and business entities holding permits to practice engineering or land surveying in this state.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 12, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 29, effective January 1, 1999. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 24. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1599e-9, 1599e-11.
